Room.Name: Road Guard Barracks
Room.ShortDescription: You are inside the barracks reserved for the guards who man the road kiosk.
Room.LongDescription: A warm fire and beds with wool blankets look very inviting. A hot soup is simmering over the fire in a black cauldron, and you see a crusty bread on the table, with a huge round of cheese. An ale keg stands at the end of the table. Apparently, this barracks is also a post office.
